Articles.Content:
As the Kerbal Space Center's official Community Manager, I've been tasked with the relaunch of our website: http://kerbalspacecenter.com/. I know a lot of you have probably had a bad experience with our old website but I think the last PR guy we had here at the KSC was really in love with green on black text and spinning animated gifs of things on fire. So we've been hard at work over the past few weeks to get the site up with a new look and plenty of content for those who want to know more about what the KSA is up to and some of our history. We've got articles about some of our crafts, some of our past missions, and some biographies of some of the great kerbonauts. And it looks like our Adminstrator has some big plans for the program as well!

Mission Reports:

Auditor I: Rendezvous and assess several orbiting assets.

Auditor II: Rendezvous with a single high orbit asset, a prototype for the EOSP program.

Traveler I: Launching a probe to scan for new resource types and forgetting to mount a radiator on it.

Traveler II: Launching a fixed version of the new resource scanner.

Auditor III: Rendezvous with the final two assets in orbit.

Traveler II update: scanner probe moves to the Mun

R-1 Auk orbital testing: testing the orbital capability of a new space plane

Delivery I: taking fuel up to orbital assets.
